subject: RE: [junit] code coverage tool Java
msgSnippet: JUnit does not have code coverage capability (and it shouldn t). I ve used Cobertura (http://cobertura.sourceforge.net/) and EMMA (
messageBody:
JUnit does not have code coverage capability (and it shouldn't).

I've used Cobertura (http://cobertura.sourceforge.net/) and EMMA (
http://emma.sourceforge.net/) in the past. They've done enough for me,
but I haven't gone looking for anything better lately.



..David..





From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
avinash anand
Sent: Monday, August 20, 2007 6:21 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] code coverage tool Java



Can anyone suggest a good code coverage tool for Java code. Does JUnit
has testing code coverage capability.
I have evaluated Agitar but its very costly $50000 for 10 licenses,
please suggest some opensource or cheaper version of them
